body_html:
I have after a lot of debugging understood this error and it is more appropriately filed and fixed as a bazel issue (bazelbuild/bazel#1642).

In the meantime, the dirty fix is to name your cache directory to something really really long:

bazel --output_base=/var/tmp/.really-really-long-cache ...

If it still doesn't work, try making it even longer.

body:
I have after a lot of debugging understood this error and it is more appropriately filed and fixed as a bazel issue (https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/1642).

In the meantime, the dirty fix is to name your cache directory to something really really long:

```
bazel --output_base=/var/tmp/.really-really-long-cache ...
```

If it still doesn't work, try making it even longer.
